subject: Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Health Clubs
lead_paragraph: Two dozen people, including a professional female boxer, were charged yesterday in an undercover investigation of two New York gyms suspected of peddling steroids and other drugs to aspiring boxers, body builders and other clients. Cindy Serrano, 25, who fights under the nickname Checkmate, was awaiting arraignment on charges of criminal sale of a controlled substance. She was ordered held on $10,000 bail. Serrano’s husband, Jordan Maldonado, 41, a manager and trainer at Envy Us Gym, also was facing charges and was ordered held without bail. A lawyer representing the couple did not immediately return a phone message. Maldonado’s gym and the other location, Powerhouse Gym, were padlocked under court orders.
